I like using Groww for investing, but one issue is with external mutual fund holdings. Even after I stopped tracking them, the old values still remain in my portfolio, which makes the overall portfolio value misleading. Groww should provide a clear option to completely remove or refresh external funds once they are redeemed or if the user chooses not to track them anymore. This will make portfolio tracking more accurate and less confusing for investors.
